titles.title: Let Veterans Honor the Fallen Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to permit a veterans service organization to use the parking lot at the Pentagon for an annual veteran-led remembrance motorcycle ride.
Let Veterans Honor the Fallen Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Let Veterans Honor the Fallen Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to authorize a veterans service organization to use the parking lot at the Pentagon as a staging area for the Rolling to Remember Memorial Day Remembrance Ride.
The veterans service organization must assume full responsibility for all expenses and liabilities arising from event activities.
